titleStmt.title: A new and accvrate map of the world drawne according to the truest descriptions, latest discoveries, and best observations, that have been made by English or strangers : with briefe and most plaine notes upon the whole body of cosmology of cosmographie for the easie vnderstanding thereof pleasant and usefull for all such as desire to know further than of their owne home.

publicationStmt.publisher: Are to be sold by Tho. Jenner at the Exchange Doore in Corne-Hill,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
